mapper.sql: select id id, username username, operation operation, method method, params params, time time, ip ip, is_deleted isDeleted, gmt_create gmtCreate, gmt_modified gmtModified from sys_log
mapper.update: update sys_log set is_deleted=1,gmt_modified=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id=#{id}
update sys_log set is_deleted=1,gmt_modified=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id in (#{item})
update sys_log set id=#{id}, username=#{username}, operation=#{operation}, method=#{method}, params=#{params}, time=#{time}, ip=#{ip}, gmt_modified=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id=#{id}
update sys_log set id=#{id}, username=#{username}, operation=#{operation}, method=#{method}, params=#{params}, time=#{time}, ip=#{ip}, gmt_modified=CURRENT_TIMESTAMP where id=#{id}
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() as id
insert into sys_log ( id, username, operation, method, params, time, ip, is_deleted,gmt_create,gmt_modified ) values ( #{id}, #{username}, #{operation}, #{method}, #{params}, #{time}, #{ip}, 0,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )

insert into sys_log ( id, username, operation, method, params, time, ip, is_deleted,gmt_create,gmt_modified ) values
( #{item.id}, #{item.username}, #{item.operation}, #{item.method}, #{item.params}, #{item.time}, #{item.ip}, 0,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
